We Are The Best At Helping People Get Their Dream Car!

Don’t Take Our Word For It Look At What Others are Saying About Us! 98% Of Our Reviews Are 5 Star!!

"The best car buying experience..."
"I have never met a car salesman with such integrity! Michael was completely transparent with us with the vehicle we cane to look at. He then redirected us to a wonderful vehicle and worked with us on price. Not to mention that he stayed late to wait for us after we had a long day and terrible previous test drive at another dealership. I highly recommend this place to anyone. They’re real, down to earth people who won’t yank you around just to make a buck! The best car buying experience I’ve had to date! Hope they’re still around in roughly 17 years when we’re searching for our son’s first car"
Allie Sprague - gave 5 STARS!

2015 Ford Expedition EL XL Sport Utility 4D for sale in Blue Springs MO from Munsterman Automotive Group
Stock : F13210 VIN : 1FMJK1GT5FEF13210 Sale Price : $14,975
Exterior : white  
Mileage : 136,114   Transmission : Automatic
Drive Type : 4WD Engine : V6, EcoBoost, Twin Turbo, 3.5 Liter  

We Finance!
Shop with Confidence
Vehicle Description
ONE OWNER! Every single option in this car is in perfect condition! Super clean Expedition features leather seats, backup camera, 3 rows of seating, Bluetooth, SYNC technology and more! Did we mention how much room this vehicle has? You could easily fit an entire soccer team in the back! Okay, maybe not but it’s worth a shot. Stop by today to check it out! Ecoboost, twin turbo, great gas mileage for such a big vehicle! 

Check out our website for additional information www.munstermanauto.com or give us a call to schedule a test drive today 816-598-1286



#wesayyeskc We really do! 100% Guaranteed Credit Approval! Schedule a test drive today, 816-598-1286! You can find more information on this vehicle or check out the rest of what we have in stock on our web site www.munstermanauto.com. Please call us anytime Monday through Saturday 9am-6pm at 816-598-1286. You can also send any questions to dalton@munstermanauto.com anytime! We are closed for business on Sundays (Family Day). Although we try to remove SOLD units as quickly as possible, due to our high inventory turnover, it is possible that some may remain online so please call in advance to make sure that the vehicle you are looking for is still in stock. Come and see us! We are located right on Highway 7, next to the Highway 7/Highway 40 intersection. We are next to the brand new QuickTrip.

Thank you for spending time with us, have a great day!
